div.container{
  width: 100%;
  padding-left: 0;
  padding-right: 0;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
}

div.vertical-container img{
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

.shadow_css{
    background-color: white;
    border-radius: 4px;
    box-shadow: #b4b4b4 0px 1px 3px;
    display: block;
}

div.shadow_css:hover{
    /*border-radius: 4px;*/
    box-shadow: #b4b4b4 0px 2px 6px;
    /*display: block;*/
}

.gray5{
    color :#818181;
}

div.signin-button.white:hover {
    background-color: #fff;
    color: #4c5256;
    text-decoration: none;
    border: #fff 2px solid;
}

div.signin-button.white{
    background-color: #409eed;
    border: #409eed 2px solid;
    width: 140px;
    text-align: center;
}


.award-icon-silveraward {
    background-image: url("data:image/png;base64,");
}
.award-icon-goldaward {
    background-image: url("data:image/png;base64,");
}
.award-icon-diamondaward {
    background-image: url("data:image/png;base64,");
}

.award-icon{
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    display: inline-block;
    background-size: 18px 18px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

.mb-8{
    margin-bottom : 8px!important;
}

.fw-700{
    font-weight: 700!important;
}

.mb-0{
    margin-bottom: 0;
}
.top-section {
    display: none;
}

.top-section .section-title.fw-700{
    font-size: 32px;
    line-height: 38px;
}

.top-section .vertical-container.left{
    padding-right: 12px;
    padding-left: 20px;
    margin-right: 0px
}

.top-section .container{
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
}
.top-section .content-block{
    padding-top: 20px;
    padding-bottom: 20px;
}


/* block1 start */

div.content-block.block1 .shadow_css{
    border-radius: 6px;
    width: 31.6%;
    background-color: white;
    flex-direction: column;
    /*position: relative;*/
    /*margin-right:2.6%;*/
}

div.content-block.block1 .shadow_css.mg{
    margin-right:2.6%;
    margin-left:2.6%;
}

.second-content{
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
}

.second-content .container{
    padding-top: 40px;
}

.second-content .block1 .shadow_css{
    text-align: center;
}
.second-content .block1 .shadow_css .img-content{
    height: 200px;
    padding-top: 40px;
    background-color: #5aaef4;
    border-top-left-radius: 6px;
    border-top-right-radius: 6px;
}
.second-content .block1 .shadow_css .img-content img{
    width: 120px;
}
.second-content .block1 .shadow_css .text-content{
    height: 200px;
    padding: 20px;
}
.second-content .block1 .shadow_css .text-content .content-block1{
    position: relative;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
}
.second-content .block1 .shadow_css .text-content .content-title{
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: 700;
}
.second-content .block1 .shadow_css .text-content .content-text{
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #6e6e6e;
    margin-top: 10px;
}
.second-content .block1 .shadow_css .text-content .content-learn{
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #2082f2;
    font-weight: 700;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 6px;
    width: 100%;
}

/* block1 end */

/* block2 start */
.forum-content-b{
    margin-left: 2.6%;
    margin-right: 2.6%;
}
.manage-div{
    display:none;
}

.block2 .content-block1{
    border-bottom: 1px solid #dcdcdc;
    margin-top: 38px;
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 1px;
    font-size: 20px;
}

.block2 .content-block{
    flex-flow: row wrap;
}

.block2 .detail_info{
    border-radius: 4px;
    width:31.6%;
    background-color: white;
    display: flex;
    padding: 20px;
    margin-top: 20px;
    align-items: center;
    position: relative;
}

/* block2 end */

.hr-title{
    border-bottom: 1px solid #dcdcdc;
    margin-top: 38px;
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 47px;
    font-size: 20px;
}

/* block3 start */
div.content-block.block3{
    flex-flow: row wrap;
    margin-top: 24px;
}

.content-block.block3 .shadow_css{
    border-radius: 6px;
    width: 31.6%;
    background-color: white;
    flex-direction: column;
    position: relative;
    /*margin-right:2.6%;*/
    padding-bottom: 12px;
}

.content-block.block3 .shadow_css.mg{
    margin-right:2.6%;
    margin-left:2.6%;
}

.content-block.block3 .shadow_css .title-img{
    position:absolute;left: 40%;
    top: -32px;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%);
}
.content-block.block3 .shadow_css .title-img img{
    height: 64px;
    margin-bottom: 0px;
}

.content-block.block3 .shadow_css .title-most{
    margin-top: 31px;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.content-block.block3 .shadow_css .most-block{
    padding:8px 10px 0 10px;
    display: flex;
}
.content-block.block3 .shadow_css .most-block img{
    height: 32px;
    width: 32px;
    margin-bottom: 0px;
    margin-left:14px
}
.content-block.block3 .shadow_css .most-block-name{
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    white-space: nowrap;
    margin-left: 10px;
    color:#222222;
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: 4px;
}
/* block3 end */

.intro_div .content-title{
    font-size: 20px;
}

/* block5 start */

.content-block.block5{
    display: flex;
    position:relative;
    flex-flow: nowrap;
    align-items: center;
    padding:32px 30px 34px 30px;
    background-color: #3a4045;
    margin: 0 auto;
    margin-top: 20px;
}

.content-block.block5 img{
    width: 180px;
    margin-bottom: 0px
}

.content-block.block5 .text-content{
    margin-left:30px;
    color: white;
}
.content-block.block5 .content-text{
    margin-top: 5px;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.content-block.block5 .remove_intro{
    position: absolute;
    top: 6px;
    right: 16px;
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #cccccc;
}

/* block5 end */


/* block6 start */
.block6{
    margin-top:18px;
    padding-bottom:5px;
    font-size: 20px
}
.block6 .content-title{
    display: inline;
    font-size: 24px;
}

/* block6 end */

/* block7 start */

.reponsive-content-width{
    max-width: 450px;
}

.content-block.block7{
    margin-top: 5px;
    justify-content: space-between;
}

.block7 .text-content-left{
    width: 656px;
    flex-direction:column;
}

.block7 .shadow_css{
    background-color: white;
    flex-direction:column;
    padding: 14px 18px 18px 18px;
    margin-bottom:20px;
}

.block7 .text-content-right{
    width: 30.6%;
    flex-direction:column;
}

.block7 .text-content-right .shadow_css{
    padding: 14px 16px 10px 16px;
    background-color: white;
}

.block7 .text-content-right .shadow_css.sliver-award{
    margin-top:20px;
}

.block7 .post-content-block{
    flex-wrap: nowrap;
    align-items: flex-start;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
}

/* block7 end */

.remove_top_section{
    cursor:pointer;
    position: absolute;
    top: 60px;
    right: 10px;
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #888888;
}

@media (max-width: 1100px){
    div.content-block{
        flex-direction: row;
    }
    div.clapat-button{
        margin: 0;
    }
}
@media (max-width: 990px){
    div.content-block{
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    .top-section div.content-block{
        flex-direction: column-reverse;
    }
    div.content-block.block1 .shadow_css{
        width: 100%;
        margin: 10px auto;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row;
        height: unset;
    }
    section.second-content .block1 .shadow_css .img-content{
        height: unset;
        padding-top: unset;
        background-color: #5aaef4;
        border-top-left-radius: 6px;
        border-top-right-radius: 0px;
        border-bottom-left-radius: 6px;
        align-items: center;
        display: flex;
    }
    section.second-content .block1 .shadow_css .text-content .content-learn{
        bottom: unset;
        margin-top: 10px;
    }

    section.second-content .block1 .shadow_css .img-content img{
        width: 90px;
        padding-left: 15px;
        padding-right: 15px;
    }

    .second-content .block1 .shadow_css .text-content{
        height: 170px;
        padding: 10px 0 0 24px;
        text-align: left;
    }

    .content-block.block5{
        width: 100%;
    }
    div.content-block.block1 .shadow_css.mg{
        margin: 10px auto;
    }
    block2 .content-block{
        flex-flow: row wrap;
    }
    .block2 .detail_info{
        width: 100%;
        margin: 10px auto;
    }

    .div.content-block.block3{
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    div.content-block.block3 .shadow_css{
        width: 100%;
        margin: 10px auto;
    }
    div.content-block.block3 .shadow_css.mg{
        margin: 40px auto;
    }

    .block7 .text-content-left{
        width: 100%;
        flex-direction:column;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .block7 .text-content-right{
        width: 100%;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction:row;
        margin: 0 auto;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }
    .block7 .text-content-right .shadow_css{
        width: 47.5%;
    }
    .block7 .text-content-right .shadow_css.sliver-award{
        margin-top:0;
    }
    .hr-title {
        margin-bottom: 41px;
    }

    .remove_top_section{
        right: 10px;
    }

}

@media (max-width: 750px) {
    div.top-section .vertical-container.left{
        padding-right: 20px;
        padding-right: 20px;
    }

    div.container{
        max-width: 100%;
        width: 100%;
        min-width: 100%;
        padding-left: 16px;
        padding-right: 16px;
    }

    .shadow_css{
        width: 100%!important;
    }
    div.block7 .text-content-left{
        width: 100%;
    }
    div.block7 .text-content-right{
        width: 100%;
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    div.block7 .text-content-right .shadow_css.sliver-award{
        margin-top: 20px;
    }


    /*div.top-section div.container{*/
    /*padding-left: 16px!important;*/
    /*padding-right: 16px!important;*/
    /*}*/
    /*div.top-section div.vertical-container.left{*/
    /*padding-right: 0;*/
    /*}*/
    div.content-block.block5{
        flex-flow: column;
    }

    .top-section .content-block{
        padding-top: 0;
    }
    .top-section .content-button{
        display: flex;
    }
    .second-content .container{
        padding-top: 36px;
    }
    .block2 .content-block{
        margin-top: 6px;
    }

    .reponsive-content-width{
        max-width: 350px;
    }

}

.mobile-responsive-show{
    display: none;
}
.mobile-responsive-show-inline{
    display: none;
}

@media (max-width: 550px) {
    .reponsive-content-width{
        max-width: 320px;
    }
    .top-section .content-button{
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    section.top-section div.vertical-container.left{
        text-align: center;
    }
    .mobile-responsive-show{
        display: block!important;
    }
    .mobile-responsive-show-inline{
        display: inline-block!important;
    }
    .mobile-responsive-hide{
        display: none!important;
    }
    .content-button div.clapat-button{
        margin-right: 0;
    }

    .second-content .block1 .shadow_css .text-content .content-title{
        font-size: 17px;
    }
    .second-content .block1 .shadow_css .text-content .content-text{
        font-size: 15px;
    }
    .second-content .block1 .shadow_css .text-content{
        padding: 10px 12px 0 12px;
    }
    .content-block.block5 .text-content{
        margin-left: 0;
    }
    .content-block.block5{
        padding:30px;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 400px) {
    .reponsive-content-width{
        max-width: 200px;
    }
}
.vote-forum-trend{
    width: 8px;
    background-size: cover;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.vote-forum-trend-up {
    height: 6px;
    background-image: url(https://groups.tapatalk-cdn.com/web/homepage/up.png);
}
.vote-forum-trend-down {
    height: 6px;
    background-image: url(https://groups.tapatalk-cdn.com/web/homepage/down.png);
}
.vote-forum-trend-none {
    height: 2px;
    background-image: url(https://groups.tapatalk-cdn.com/web/homepage/Line4%402x.png);
}

.vote-forum-rank{
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    margin: 0 10px;
    padding: 0 5px;
    background-size: cover;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.vote-forum-rank-1{
    background-image: url(https://groups.tapatalk-cdn.com/web/homepage/first_rank.png);
}

.vote-forum-rank-2{
    background-image: url(https://groups.tapatalk-cdn.com/web/homepage/second_rank.png);
}

.vote-forum-rank-3{
    background-image: url(https://groups.tapatalk-cdn.com/web/homepage/third_rank.png);
}
